932510.name: Fantasy Grounds - Tome of Beasts Pack 2: Clockworks - Dinosaurs (Token Pack)
932510.description:
Tome of Beasts Pack 2: Clockworks - Dinosaurs

I am excited to release the second of 8 packs covering the 400 monsters that appear in Kobold Press' Tome of Beasts.
Pack 2 contains 50 creatures from Kobold Press' Tome of Beasts.
Created by Devin Night these tokens can be used to represent the monsters from the tome or stand in for any monster of similar appearance.
The pack contains 50 unique tokens:
  • Clockwork Abomination
  • Clockwork Beetle
  • Clockwork Beetle Swarm
  • Clockwork Hound
  • Clockwork Huntsman
  • Clockwork Myrmidon
  • Clockwork Watchman
  • Clockwork Weaving Spider
  • Clurichaun
  • Cobbleswarm
  • Corpse Mound
  • Dau
  • Death Butterfly Swarm
  • Deathwisp
  • Deep One
  • Deep One Archimandrite
  • Deep One Priest
  • Demon Alquam
  • Demon Apau
  • Demon Berstuc
  • 2 Demon Kishi
  • Demon Lord Akyishigal
  • Demon Lord Akyishigal Spawn
  • Demon Lord Camazotz
  • Demon Malakbel
  • Demon Mechuiti
  • Demon Oorgeth, Lord of Worms
  • Demon Psoglav
  • Demon Rubezahl
  • Demon Fetal Savant
  • Derro Shadow Anti-Paladin
  • Devil Arbeyach
  • Devil Arbeyach Spawn
  • Devil Automata
  • Devil Chort
  • Devil Crystalline
  • Devil Gilded
  • Devil La Affrat
  • Devil Ink
  • Devil Koralk
  • Devil Lord Mammon
  • Devil Lunar
  • Devil Orobas
  • Devil Salt
  • Devil Totivillus
  • Dino Mbielu
  • Dino Ngobou
  • Dino Spinosaurus
  • Dino Skin Bat
The tokens are made with permission from Kobold Press.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
